name: OMNI FEDERAL
sampleDescriptions: Educate members on the implementation of digital learning at the Department of Defense.
Educate members on digital learning and the implementation of data as a service at the Department of Defense.

Educate members on digital learning and the implementation of data as a service at the Department of Defense in the FY 2024 National Defense Authorization Act and the FY 2024 Defense Appropriations Ac
Educate members on digital learning and the implementation of data as a service at the Department of Defense in H.R.2670 and S.2226 and the Senate FY 2024 Defense Appropriations Act and H.R.4365.
